title: Practical Learning Competency Enhancement Program for Agricultural Extension Workers

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational Agricultural Theory and Fieldwork Experience
context.additional_context: Focuses on pre-service teachers acquiring practical knowledge for agricultural field problem-solving and building peer learning communities

learning_goals: Learners can analyze agricultural field problems and propose solutions through experiential learning models
Learners integrate knowledge and engage in reflective thinking through community of practice activities with peers
Learners connect formal/informal learning resources (mentoring, graduate programs, peer groups) to build sustainable learning networks
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
